comment: you doesn't care your millions of gods but we care our one god . this is different between you and us.

comment: Because we don't like double standards of Muslims. They hate other's religions but want respect for themselves. If you're an atheist or accept criticism, we welcome you to draw cartoons but don't get offended when we would make such caricatures of your misogynistic allah.
amr:

      :snt1 (c / cause-01

                                    :name (n / name

                              :ARG1 y)))))
